attributes.action: bring fairness to fuel allownce for the disabled
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: create justice for the tax payer by restricting all fuel allowance payments to the genuinely needy; not the able-bodied fully employed greedy regardless of age e.g. 60 year old MPs getting £60+k p.a.& expenses don't need it   nor do 'fat cats,  retired on big pensions but the disabled /unwaged are vulnerable and desperately need it

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
